title: Flexible Rent Payments with Flex, Bark Park, Online Rent Payments
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1039 Sq.

At Annadel Apartments you'll find a modern community where well-curated one, two, and three-bedroom apartments in Santa Rosa, CA, blend with resort style amenities designed to complement your Sonoma County lifestyle.

Adjacent to a 2.5-acre park and minutes from the area's most exceptional wine, food, attractions, and culture, Annadel's pet-friendly apartments in Santa Rosa are the best location nearby Windsor, Rohnert Park, Petaluma, Novato, and more for your lifestyle.
When you arrive home, you'll enjoy unrivaled amenities - such as our wine bar, game room with billiards table, state-of-the-art fitness center complete with Peloton bikes, and saltwater pool and spa.
Looking to get your favorite pet outside?
Visit our bark park or take a stroll down to the community garden.
Our 1039 square foot 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is a dream!
It has a washer and dryer in the unit with extra storage and a desk nook in your entryway!
Cream quartz countertops paired with espresso cabinets add eye-catching contrast to your upgraded kitchen that will come with high-efficiency stainless steel appliances.

Additionally, your apartment will have a cozy private balcony overlooking our lovely grounds and, in the interior, vaulted ceilings in all third floor apartment homes, plank flooring, and a large master bedroom with TWO walk-in closets paired with a large master bath!
If you are looking for comfort and style at an amazing price this apartment was made for you!
It is available for rent RIGHT NOW!!
Don't miss out on this great opportunity!!

Resort Style Chlorinated Pool & Spa, Limited Yearly Renewal Increases, Peloton Bikes in Fitness Center, Professionally Managed with Onsite Staff, Bocce Ball Court, Easy Access to The 101, Online Rent Payments, Indoor and Outdoor Fireside Lounges, Resident Amazon Hub, Business Center Equipped with WiFi and Printing Access, Plush Clubhouse with Lounge Space, Billiards, Board Games, Books, & Big Screens, Coffee Bar with Espresso Machine, Community Garden, Close to Downtown Santa Rosa, 2.5 Acre Park, Fully Equipped 24-Hour Fitness Center, Online Maintenance Requests, Flexible Rent Payments with Flex, Bark Park, Wine Bar with Wine Lockers, Dog Waste Stations, Multiple Barbecue Areas, Saltwater Lap Pool & Spa
We welcome up to two pets per apartment home.
Cats and dogs are welcome, while poisonous and exotic animals are excluded.
We do not have a weight limit but restricted breeds do apply.
We reserve the right to restrict breeds.
Animal(s) may be viewed by Management prior to approval.
We reserve the right to decline or revoke permission for any animal(s) that causes disturbances or is a safety thread.
A current (within 30 days) good health certificate from a veterinarian is required.
Photo of Animal(s) required for lost and found purposes.
Annadel Apartments provides an essential housing program for the middle income community.
We will base your rental rate qualifications on your household size and household gross annual income combined.
Rental rates does not include utilities and additional add on.

To gather more details in regards to your specific rental rate qualification based on your household annual gross income combined, please do not hesitate to reach out to us to begin the prequalification process to secure your next home.
*Your security deposit will be determined based on your credit screening and current verifiable and qualifying rental verification.
Refundable upon application denial or cancellation with 72 hours of the application date.
Upon application approved, your $200.00 holding deposit payment will be apply towards your move in security deposit.
